statements: SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_id = 1;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loans WHERE loan_id > 3;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_term FROM loans WHERE borrower_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE interest_rate <= 5.0;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_purpose FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY loan_id DESC
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, loan_purpose FROM loans WHERE interest_rate < 5 AND loan_term > 24
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE borrower_name LIKE '%John%' AND loan_purpose = 'Home Improvement'
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loans WHERE loan_term = 36 ORDER BY interest_rate ASC
SELECT loan_id, borrower_name, loan_purpose FROM loans WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000
SELECT * FROM lenders;
SELECT lender_name, investment_amount FROM lenders ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT loan_name, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE interest_rate > 3.5;
SELECT lender_name, loan_name, loan_amount FROM lenders INNER JOIN loans ON lenders.lender_id = loans.lender_id;
SELECT lender_name, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM lenders INNER JOIN loans ON lenders.lender_id = loans.lender_id GROUP BY lender_name;
SELECT * FROM lenders WHERE lender_name = 'ABC Lenders';
SELECT lender_name, investment_amount FROM lenders WHERE investment_amount > 5000;
SELECT loan_name, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loans WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT lender_name, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM lenders GROUP BY lender_name ORDER BY total_investment DESC;
SELECT lenders.lender_name, loans.loan_name, loans.loan_amount FROM lenders INNER JOIN loans ON lenders.lender_id = loans.lender_id WHERE loans.interest_rate < 5.00;
SELECT * FROM loan_opportunities;
SELECT opportunity_id, borrower_name FROM loan_opportunities WHERE loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT lender_name, total_investment FROM lender_info WHERE investment_limit > 50000 ORDER BY total_investment DESC;
SELECT opportunity_id, borrower_name, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loan_opportunities WHERE borrower_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM investment_logs WHERE invest_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY invest_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM loan_opportunities WHERE loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY interest_rate DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM loan_opportunities WHERE interest_rate BETWEEN 5.5 AND 7.5 ORDER BY loan_amount ASC;
SELECT lender_name, total_investment, investment_limit FROM lender_info WHERE total_investment < investment_limit;
SELECT log_id, opportunity_id, lender_id, investment_amount, invest_date FROM investment_logs WHERE investment_amount >= 50000 ORDER BY invest_date DESC;
SELECT lender_name, total_investment AS total_invested, investment_limit AS max_investment FROM lender_info WHERE total_investment > 100000;
SELECT * FROM borrowers ORDER BY borrower_name DESC;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM borrowers WHERE loan_term > 5;
SELECT lender_name, location FROM lenders WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT loan_type, interest_rate FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 100000;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE invest_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM borrowers WHERE loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE interest_rate < 5;
SELECT lender_name, location FROM lenders WHERE location IN ('New York', 'California');
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE invest_amount >= 5000 AND invest_amount <= 10000;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount, loan_term FROM borrowers JOIN loans ON borrowers.loan_amount = loans.loan_amount;
SELECT * FROM borrowers;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM borrowers WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT lender_name, investment_amount FROM lenders WHERE investment_status = TRUE;
SELECT loan_type, interest_rate, loan_term FROM loans;
SELECT opportunity_id, loan_id, borrower_id, opportunity_status FROM loan_opportunities WHERE opportunity_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM borrowers;
SELECT borrower_name, loan_amount FROM borrowers WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT lender_name, investment_amount FROM lenders ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT loan_type, interest_rate FROM loans WHERE loan_type ILIKE 'Personal%' AND interest_rate < 10;
SELECT * FROM loan_opportunities WHERE opportunity_status IS TRUE;
